name: Spotify Premium Student
description: Spotify Premium plus Hulu for $5.99/month (50% off) for students
fullDescription: Spotify offers college students Premium for $5.99/month (normally $11.99), including Hulu with ads and Showtime. Available for up to 4 years while enrolled.
whatTheyOffer:
- Spotify Premium for $5.99/month (50% off)
- Ad-free music streaming
- Offline listening
- Hulu (ad-supported) included
- Available for up to 4 years
- Re-verify enrollment annually
howToGetIt:
1. Visit spotify.com/us/student
2. Verify enrollment through SheerID
3. Must be at Title IV accredited US college/university
4. Sign up or upgrade existing account
5. Re-verify student status every 12 months
keywords: Spotify, student discount, music streaming, Premium, Hulu, Showtime, college, university
